actions.description: The screamer makes one Drill attack, and it uses Sonic Scream.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Drill

actions.description: The screamer emits destructive energy in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) thunder damage and be knocked prone.
actions.name: Sonic Scream

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Duergar Screamer [MoM]
